passover.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-block: 2em; max-width: 60em; white-space: pre-wrap;

children.text: The typical project structure for development files is as follows:

project-root/
├── dist/
├── routes/
│   ├── skeleton.json
│   ├── globals.json
│   ├── templates.json
│   └── some-other-route/
│       └── skeleton.json
├── static/
│   ├── favicon/
│   ├── images/
│   └── scripts/
└── cwrapConfig.js
children.style: background-color: #14253D; border-radius: 8px; box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 2em; width: fit-content;
